article_title: Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton Clash on Health Care

article_metadata.author: Michael D. Shear

twitter.description: Health care has become almost as contentious in the Democratic primary as it has been for the last several years between Democrats and Republicans in Washington. It became the first point of tension between Mr. Sanders and Mrs. Clinton on Thursday night. Mrs. Clinton is eager to cast her rival as willing to push aside […]
